A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Liked it after the first time\, and liked it even more after the second time.  There are some real tense moments for me in this film especially circulating around the throne room scene\, cruiser Haldo sacrfice scene\, and then with Luke at the end.  Also\, love seeing the tension in Rey and Kylo's relationship.  I don't understand all the hate with this film\, all the actors did a great job\, and I'm pumped and looking forward to # 9!!
